title: The Draymond Green Show - Emergency Pod: Dray Reacts To His Game 1 Ejection
itunes:title: The Draymond Green Show - Emergency Pod: Dray Reacts To His Game 1 Ejection
description:
Draymond Green breaks down the flagrant 2 foul on Brandon Clarke he was assessed with in Game 1 of Warriors-Grizzlies in the Western Conference Semifinals. He explains his side of it, why he was impressed his teammates Steph Curry, Jordan Poole, and Klay Thompson were able to step up, and more. #Herd

Produced by: Jackson Safon

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
